welcome.title: Welcome to Panorama Resort
welcome.description: Nestled in a peaceful and natural setting, Panorama Resort offers the perfect escape where comfort, relaxation, and nature come together in harmony. Whether you're seeking a quiet retreat or outdoor adventures, here you'll find the ideal place for an unforgettable stay.

items.description: Relax in comfortable, stylishly designed rooms, crafted to offer you maximum comfort and tranquility in the heart of nature.

items.title: Authentic Albanian Flavors
items.description: Savor traditional Albanian cuisine at our restaurant, where authentic recipes are crafted with fresh, local ingredients, bringing you true flavors and heartfelt hospitality.

roomsSection.title: Rooms & Amenities

Our rooms are designed to offer a relaxing and comfortable stay, whether you're traveling solo, as a couple, or with your family.
Every space reflects warmth, functionality, and the calming atmosphere of our natural surroundings.
Each room includes comfortable beds, a private bathroom, free Wi-Fi, and beautiful views of the surrounding area ‚Äî everything you need for a peaceful and pleasant stay.
